features: Hypoallergenic, water-free formula is great for sensitive skin types.

Rice lees extract has a rich source of antioxidants, so it hydrates and strengthens the skin’s barrier while softening skin. Rice powder from Japanese Sake both physically and chemically revitalizes skin and provides gentle scrub. Papain (papaya enzyme) exfoliates dead cells, leaving skin more radiant.
Contains hyaluronic acid for extra hydrating.
Anti-aging properties even out skin tone and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
No added chemicals, alcohol, astringents, sulfates, or fragrances.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Simple formula, only 10 ingredients. No added chemicals, alcohol, astringents, sulfates, or fragrances. Hyaluronic acid for extra hydrating.
Rice Powder Rice lees extract with rich source of antioxidants will hydrate and soften skin. Rice powder from Sake both physically and chemically revitalizes skin.
Papaya Enzymes The Papaya enzymes in this facial scrub powder will give your skin a youthful glow by exfoliating your dead skin cells!

Ingredients: Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Sodium Lauroyl Glutamate, Diglycerin, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Lees Extract, Cellulose Gum, Maltodextrin, Papain, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Powder

How to use 1. Dispense about half a teaspoon into wet hands and rub until a light, creamy foam is created.2. Gently massage in circular motions avoiding the eye area.3. Rinse thoroughly with water and pat dry.

Important Notes Do not use on broken skin and avoid direct contact with eyes. Rinse directly with water if the product accidentally gets into your eyes. 1. Patch testing prior to use is advised. Discontinue if irritation occurs. 2. Keep product dry by securing the cap when not in use.3. Reduce the amount used depending on your skin type.4. Store at room temperature and avoid contact with direct sunlight.5. Keep out of reach of children.

Store at room temperature and avoid contact with direct sunlight.5. Keep out of reach of children.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: to get to the point, I have dry flaky Uber sensitive skin. I usually use chemical exfoliants. But i recently destroyed my skin barrier and I haven't been able to use my retinal without it burning my face. But my skin was so flaky i needed to do some sort of exfoliation. This was semi perfect. So the product is not the exfoliating when you rub it btwn your hands. I recommend putting it in your hands no water and spreading it across a dampo face so you can actually exfoliate your face. If you add water to the powder and rub your hands together the "exfoliantes" will dissolve. other than that i might repurchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is nearly exact to the same.product.like the Tatcha rice wash. It even has that great exfoliation properties, and I'm here for.it!! I will be repurchasing because it nicely exfoliates my skin without being harsh. And it's more then half the price is Tatcha! I'm impressed! I rarely ever give five stars but this product deserves it!! ❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good but other options out there
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to try against good molecules pineapple scrub that is just like it -This is much smaller in hand then it sends it would be onlineHere’s the main points:GM PINEAPPLE EXFOLIATING POWDER:Glass bottle2.1 oz$16/bottleVegan and clean ingredientsJUNO CLEANSING AND EXFOLIATING POWDER:Plastic bottle1.76oz$18 on their site10 ingredientsI like how it foams up better then GM and I don’t have to use very much - still testing but both good options

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this product, works great with my skin. But I do have normal skin so if you’re acne prone it could be different for you! Also it comes as powder and you are the water to your hands to mix it !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this gentle cleanser
reviews.reviewText: Use this every morning for a very gentle cleanse, my pores are noticeably smaller and the powder form foams up so well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Product is a great affordable dupe for Dermalogica Daily Microfoliant Exfoliator powder that retails for $65. Lathers well. Soft physical exfoliation.I took two stars off because the product container doesn’t come completely filled and the size for the cost. (See my attached video.) Other brands offer the same results, quality and price point with more product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It really gets into my pores and my face always feels clean when I use this product. I recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The only face wash I will ever use
reviews.reviewText: This product has helped so much with my skin texture and it gives a deep clean unmatched to anything I’ve ever used. It’s great for travel because you don’t have to worry about it leaking, it’s lightweight and the packaging is super accessible for people with disabilities because it’s easy to open. Will be buying this product for the rest of my life.
